title: Most impressive & disappointing position units this season
itunes:title: Most impressive & disappointing position units this season
description:
DJ & Bucky begin the show discussing the Nationals’ world series win over the Astros and what you can learn from the Nats losing Bryce Harper in the offseason and winning it all (0:20). Then, the guys discuss the most impressive, disappointing & rising position units in the NFL: Wide Receivers (6:00), Running Back (13:30), Pass Rushers (20:40), Secondary (27:50). Jake Heaps, Director of Operations & Head QB coach of the Russell Wilson QB Academy, joins DJ & Bucky to discuss working with the Pro Bowl QB and what it takes to develop a Quarterback (33:50). To close the show, the guys answer fan questions (1:00:30). To find the video of the Russell Wilson tape breakdown from the Jake Heaps interview, visit NFL.com/MTSVideo

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
